titleStmt.title: Mercurius ecclesiasticus: or, Doctor Cozens his visitation at Warrington in Lancashire, with divers presentments and censures therein passed. Together with a true story of the reader of Liverpoole his twice over wronged breeches, brought before the said doctor there.
titleStmt.author: Nedham, Marchamont, 1620-1678, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: A satire, in verse. --Cf. Thomason Coll.
Attributed to Marchamont Nedham in the Wrenn catalogue.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 7th 1644"; the 5 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
